dialog.title: Rotate Pages
dialog.subTitle: Page Range
dialog.sampleTips:
Page Range

To use logical page number, enclose
the page number in quotes. Example:
"A", If the logical page numbers
include quote or backslash symbols,
add a '\' before the quote or
backslash. Example, from pages \5 to
page "12":"\\5"-"\"12\""
dialog.noPageSelected: No page is selected. Please select appropriate options.
